Char West Fast Food Restaurant http://www.dexknows.com/business_profiles/char_west_fast_food_restaurant-l803603055/ (805) 962-5631 221 Stearns Wharf , Santa Barbara , CA 93101 34.4095 -119.685 Send to Phone Write a Review Reviews by Jamie T. - 10/31/2011
The location and view is amazing; it's the best thing they have going for them. The clam chowder was pretty good. The fries were great, but the fish's fried covering was not good. I wouldn't recommend... Read Full Review on Yelp.com. by Benny E. - 09/04/2011
So irritated! I wish I could pull a Gordon Ramsey on the place. You are on a pier, with access to the world best seafood and you serve frozen fish!
Insanity! I decided on the Shrimp Caesar Salad,... Read Full Review on Yelp.com. by Fred P. - 08/14/2011
We just passing thru n wanted to take a walk&get a quick bite, preferrably seafood. Char looked like one of them small homely shack joints one has to try. The girl at the counter was nice n friendly&... Read Full Review on Yelp.com.
